title: waver
description: Creates an ideal waveform timeseries file.

gam.title: Gamma waveform
gam.description: Sets waveform to form t^b * exp(-t/c) (cf. Mark Cohen)

expr.title: Expression for custom waveform
expr.description: Sets waveform to the expression given, which should depend on the variable 't'.

file_opt.title: File for waveform values
file_opt.description: Sets waveform to the values read from the file wname, which should be a single column .1D file. The dt value is the time step (in seconds) between lines in wname.

undershoot.title: Undershoot
undershoot.description: Sets undershoot to # times the peak [0.2]

restore_time.title: Restore time
restore_time.description: Sets time to restore from undershoot [2]

gamd.title: Gamma delay time
gamd.description: Sets the delay time to # seconds [0.0]

dt.title: Time step
dt.description: Sets time step of output AND input [0.1]

xyout.title: XY output flag
xyout.description: Output data in 2 columns: 1=time 2=waveform (useful for graphing) [default is 1 column=waveform]

input_file.title: Input file
input_file.description: Read timeseries from *.1D formatted 'infile'; convolve with waveform to produce output

inline_data.title: Inline input data
inline_data.description: Read timeseries from command line DATA; convolve with waveform to produce output

tstim_data.title: Tstim input data
tstim_data.description: Read discrete stimulation times from the command line and convolve the waveform with delta-functions at those times.

when_data.title: When input data
when_data.description: Read time blocks when stimulus is 'on' (=1) from the command line and convolve the waveform with with a zero-one input.

numout.title: Number of output points
numout.description: Output a timeseries with NN points; if this option is not given, then enough points are output to let the result tail back down to zero.
